about_the_game:
Not a Masterpiece invites players on a whimsical journey through a vibrant cartoon world, where nothing is quite as it seems. Assume the role of the enigmatic black suit bandit as you navigate through three captivating maps in this 3D third-person platformer. Your mission? Reach the elusive final red button, hidden amidst a myriad of platforms and obstacles, and unravel the mysteries of this surreal landscape.

STORYLINE

In a bizarre twist of fate, the black suit bandit finds themselves transported into a cartoon world brimming with color and charm. Tasked with an enigmatic quest to reach the final red button, our protagonist embarks on a whimsical adventure filled with unexpected challenges and delightful surprises. But beware, for not everything is as it appears in this eccentric realm.

GAMEPLAY

As the black suit bandit, you'll leap, dash, and maneuver your way through dynamic and imaginative environments, each more fantastical than the last. Traverse precarious platforms, dodge whimsical obstacles, and unravel mind-bending puzzles as you journey closer to your elusive goal. The path to the final red button is fraught with peril, but with cunning and dexterity, victory is within reach.

CARTOON WORLD

Explore three captivating maps, each teeming with vibrant landscapes, quirky characters, and hidden secrets waiting to be uncovered. From the whimsical confines of a bustling cityscape to the enchanting depths of a fantastical forest, every location in Not a Masterpiece is a feast for the senses, brimming with charm and personality.

GAME FEATURES:

    []Immerse yourself in a surreal cartoon world filled with charm and whimsy[]Control the enigmatic black suit bandit as you navigate through dynamic 3D environments[]Leap, dash, and maneuver your way through platforms and obstacles to reach the final red button[]Explore three captivating maps, each with its own unique challenges and surprises

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64
  • Processor: Intel Celeron
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 820M 2048MB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
